summary: Brandon Ma is an average Joe but his best friend, Michael, is a sinister drug dealer with a crush on Brandon's girlfriend, May. When Michael murders a dirty cop and frames his friend, sending him to jail, Brandon returns for vengeance.
cast: Brandon Lee|Michael Wong|Regina Kent|Michael Wai-Man Chan|Onno Boelee|Hak Chu|Tau Chu|Lung Fei|Raymond Sai-Hung Fung|Kwok Wing Ha|Shang He|Hsin Nan Hung|Chui Kin-Wa|Blackie Shou Liang Ko|Clifton Ko|Feng Ku|Chung Lam|Foo-Wai Lam|Kin-Chuen Lee|Tanya Lemani|Chun-Kit Leung|Ken Lo|Yuen-Yan Lo|Kenneth Low|Wai-Cheung Mak|Hoi Mang|Man-Tat Ng|Louis Roth|Fui-On Shing|Johnny Wang|Johnny Yin-Ming Wong|Kirk Wong|Kok Cheong Wong|Ruby Wong|Bolo Yeung|Wing-Cho Yip|Ronny Yu|Timothy Zao|Adam Frank|Pedro Massobrio|Stuart Smith
